title: Mobile-Based Anatomy Problem-Centered Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomical terminology and comprehension of human body structures
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments using personal devices, emphasizing case-based education applicable to real-world contexts

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given clinical cases and identify relevant anatomical structures with 80% accuracy
Learners can present three or more approaches to applying anatomical knowledge to real-world scenarios through team-based problem-solving activities
Learners can write problem-solving reports incorporating peer feedback five or more times weekly using mobile platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
